title: Centre place Graslin
address: Nantes, Pays de la Loire, France
description:
Enjoy an elegant 20 m2 private room in a renovated 160 m2 apartment in the heart of Nantes city center in the Graslin district.
The charm of the old renovated: ceiling height of 3.60m, period parquet, black marble fireplace, comfortable shower room.
extraInfo:
The room is equipped with a queensize bed 160cm x 200cm.
The room is non-smoking.
Bed linen and towels are provided and washed at 60Â°.
We love animals, but we are complete on this level: we already have 2 adorable cats. We will not be able to welcome more.
No parties or visits to the apartment from outside people.

title: Cliffside Bamboo Treehouse
description: Experience Bali from a birds-eye view in The Avana Treehouse Bamboo Villa. This once-in-a-lifetime bamboo villa experience sits 15 meters high amongst the clove trees on a cliffâ€™s edge. Enjoying the view from any of the 3-story areas will leave you relaxed and with the sensation you are floating in the air.
extraInfo: The Avana Treehouse is surrounded by nature, with an open design. From time to time, nature's residents (insects, bugs, frogs, lizards, etc.) may visit you at the villa. We keep everything clean, however, avoiding nature's residents during your stay cannot be avoided. Not leaving any leftover food and turning all the lights off at night will help deter them. If you are sensitive to this normal part of the experience here, we recommend you find more suitable lodging during your time in Bali.

title: Spacious Water Villa with Private Pool
description:
At the villa you're a world away from the grip of the city, you are in your spiritual home.The rhythm of life here is serene.


> Entire Water villa on stilt in private island
> Private Pool
> 45 minutes speedboat ride,
> A number of Excursions & activities available
> One kid stay free
> Maximum 2adults 2 kids
> 109 SQM
> Split stay in different types of villa possible


Kindly, ping me before sending reservation request to arrange transportation to & from Male International Airport
extraInfo:
Other things to note
Clients need to book a mandatory speedboat to reach the resort
